website_summaries.verdict: A good basic set with lots of colorful options.
pros: Features aluminum construction with nonstick interiors plus comfortable grippy handles
Mix-and-match shatter-resistant glass lids are interchangeable on the skillets and pans, plus you can keep an eye on things without removing the lid
Users found they locked in heat and moisture without hot spots
cons: The spatula and spoon are bendy and not substantial

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT buy this garbage!
customer_reviews.text: Recieved these yesterday. Used the 2qt sauce pan to simmer water on low/medium heat. Enamel is chipped and coming off already. These are garbage! Contacted Rachel ray and customer service will not refund and warranty claim will take 9-12 weeks to replace IF they deem it's a defect. So I'm out the $100+ on garbage cookware that won't hold up to 1 use.
customer_reviews.author: SSOHSS

customer_reviews.title: Bad purchase (video attached)
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: video attached After using a pan 4 times we now had it happen again... we really don't understand what this is but its absolutely disgusting. And no.. it wasnt in there when we started.
customer_reviews.author: Nikko

customer_reviews.title: The nonstick starts to flake early on in use.
customer_reviews.text: These pans are not very high quality. The saute pan in particular is poorly designed in that the bolts holding the handle to the pan are exposed on the inside of the pan so that food and grit is difficult to clean. The nonstick coating comes off in chunks after only a year of use even though I've never used metal utensils or abrasive cleaners on it. I've now thrown that pan away, and most of the rest will follow soon.
customer_reviews.author: sail2blue

customer_reviews.title: People have to read directions
customer_reviews.text: The complaints about these pans are reflective of the lack of knowledge about taking care of this cookware, didn't have problems with mine, take precautions that were warranted by the enclosed proper care instructions.
customer_reviews.author: GNU

customer_reviews.title: No issue with our cookware.
customer_reviews.text: This product was perfect for my wife. She loves the cookware and takes great care of them. Not to mention they really match her kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Craven

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful set but bottom bubbles in Heat
customer_reviews.text: I'm giving it to three star review because the quality is beautiful, but I have a gas stove and a very first time I use the pot it bubbles on the bottom and damaged the color. Very unfortunate for the price. I feel like the color should be more durable than this. But besides that beautiful set.
customer_reviews.author: Kitty Kitty Bang Bang

customer_reviews.title: I would buy again
customer_reviews.text: 3 yrs later and still work great. Food still don’t stick to them and they clean up easily, even being scratched up.
customer_reviews.author: J. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: After 4 months and cooking daily (and sometimes more than twice daily) still keeps the nonstick easy to clean . No discoloration... other than the flat pan it has some spots that i cant get off but other than that i love this set and want more Edit : 8 month review still perfect , on pan wrpeed a little cause not think i stuck it in cold water while it was hot .. my own fault but they are all still beautiful in color and just prefect
customer_reviews.author: Krissy Noel

customer_reviews.title: Teflon coming off & paint flaking.
customer_reviews.text: I will never buy them again. I only use melmac or pampered chef utensils and the Teflon is coming off. They are always hand washed, I put a cardboard lining between my pots when storing and the paint is discolored and flaking off. I give 2 stars because when I first got them I absolutely loved them. This is the reason I wait to rate products.
customer_reviews.author: Chrishel Rene'

customer_reviews.title: Me gusta
customer_reviews.text: I rage cleaned my kitchen and threw everything away a few months back. Then I decided to take the opportunity to redecorate! I was going for a citrusy vibe and this set fit the bill for everything I really cared about (quality, price and appearance). My sister who’s basically a kitchen connoisseur told me that I should have bought stainless steel, but I googled it and I’m still happy with my choice. You can’t use metal utensils with these but that’s fine cause the sound of metal scraping on anything is irritating AF anyway! I really like these and everytime I look at them, I smile and I feel like I really have my life together.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia Smith

customer_reviews.title: 3 stars for the disappointment
customer_reviews.text: I love how the food cooks in these BUT After only using twice with plastic NOT metal they already have scratch marks in them. Big disappointment for the money I paid.
customer_reviews.author: TLB

customer_reviews.title: I received a set like these 10 years ago for my wedding
customer_reviews.text: I received a set like these 10 years ago for my wedding, so when they finally were looking a little worn I did not feel guilty at all spending the money on another set. The handles are soft yet oven friendly. The medium pot is a little smaller than the original version of Rachel Ray cookware, so i was a little disappointed that I would need to use the large pot for jobs that were really too small for that particular size. I would have liked the medium pot to big another quart bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Molly Hoyt

customer_reviews.title: Follow care instructions and all will be fine.
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't sure about these after seeing some negative reviews, but am very pleased with them. The key thing is to follow care instructions and haven't had any problems. Love the color which was as shown. Love the easy clean up and the way they stack so nicely saving storage space.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: High quality, low price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set about 8 months ago and I haven't had any issues with any of the pans or pieces. I cook with them every day, and haven't seen any scratches, chips, staining, or rust. I think it also depends on how you care for them. I wash my dishes immediately after each use, not leaving things to soak, and I prewash dishes before they go in a dishwasher, to make sure oil and grime are off first. This was an excellent buy, in my opinion. I've been looking into adding more pieces from her collections and maybe getting a second set of these. Very good quality for the money.
customer_reviews.author: 1nf3ct1ous

customer_reviews.title: Besides that they work great, easy to clean and the color is bright
customer_reviews.text: The sauce pans are a lot smaller then I thought they would be, I guess that is my fault. Besides that they work great, easy to clean and the color is bright. They are very light weight, but seem to hold heat and cook evenly, so I can't complain about that. I haven't had them very long but we cook 2-3 meals a day every day and so far they are holding up fine. I'll come back in a few months to review again to see how they are holding up.
customer_reviews.author: Trina

customer_reviews.title: Belongs in the trash
customer_reviews.text: Gave it to my mom as a house warming gift, she says she is completely in love with this pretty set. She says its the best one she owns. Update: The color did not hold up to 1 use, she has a gas range the enamel chipped and the nonstick polish inside started coming off, this for sure is going to be returned as it doesn’t belong in my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Raj

customer_reviews.title: Great for anywhere!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second set of cookware from Rachel Ray. I got the first one as a gift from the EX and missed them so much, I decided to buy the same set only in a different color for my RV. Easy to use, easy to clean...got the green color which makes me happy every time I use it. The box came early which was a surprise. Not too heavy...not too light. Would make a great wedding present!
customer_reviews.author: Vickie L. Galle

customer_reviews.title: Nice Pans
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to have a nonstick pan. They work pretty well, but there are times that it does stick, which is why I'm giving 4 stars vs 5 stars. It is a pretty blue and does come in an assortment of pretty colors.
customer_reviews.author: GJ

customer_reviews.title: Unhappy with damage to product
customer_reviews.text: One sauce pan was dented and scratched. See attached photo.
customer_reviews.author: gary Bedford

customer_reviews.title: Some flaws but overall a good set.
customer_reviews.text: Smaller pot sizes then expected. Very light weight and thin. To preserve effectiveness it’s necessary to be very careful when cooking, cleaning and storing. Per instructions and warnings from customer reviews. But there are pluses. The colors are very attractive. They can be used on lower heat settings because they are thin. If you are prudent when cooking they are non-stick and use little oil. The utensils are great and I love the handles on the lids. I use them everyday.
customer_reviews.author: P J Culp

customer_reviews.title: Its for people who don't cook
customer_reviews.text: Bought this close to a year ago. With moderate use the cookware is chipped, rusted, doesn't clean very well (save your baking soda and lemons) and unsafe to continue using. The nonstick aspect lasts about six months. This product might work for you if you only use it once in a while however, if you need to make those omlets daily, expect a short lifespan. I don't know if my set defective or the recent mass produced sets are not living up to the previous ones because other people whom I know that have older versions of this set have had it for years without problems 😩
customer_reviews.author: A.

customer_reviews.title: Bent lids,  cheap feeling
customer_reviews.text: I use to love Rachel Ray stuff but some of the lids were bent right out of the box, and the feel of the pots were very cheap. Food kept sticking to the pans. Very disappointing. I have Rachel Ray's Mixing bowl and love it had lasted 6 years and not a thing wrong with it. I was expecting the same quality but instead got something very cheaply made.
customer_reviews.author: Justine Devenport

customer_reviews.title: Not worth your money
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I cook as a hobby and I can honestly say that this set is great for about 4 months of use. We take care of all of our cooking appliances and within four months these pots and pans faded in color, scratched very easily and the finish has come off of half of them. Not a worthy purchase for anyone who is looking for quality cooking products.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Brown

customer_reviews.title: Wipes down beautifully! I've used it several times and have had ...
customer_reviews.text: Wipes down beautifully! I've used it several times and have had no issues with the bottoms marking or burning. Truly a beautiful color addition to the kitchen. I hand wash, dry and store it after every use and it looks as new as the day I purchased it. I even purchased another size that did not come with this set. GREAT set with for an incredible price!!! I would purchase again as well as recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Angel Meadows

customer_reviews.title: low quality set with a fancy name
customer_reviews.text: Was 5 stars when purchased, but after time dropped down to 3 stars. not worth purchasing. not dish washer safe (someone in the house washed it only one time and the paint entirely lost its use), and the others are rusting/peeling on the interior
customer_reviews.author: SPARTAN-117

customer_reviews.title: Don't Use Dishwasher!
customer_reviews.text: These are super cute, and I LOVE them. However, one of the pans began to chip three uses in. The nonstick coating is beginning to peel in a couple of spots. I'm assuming this is from being cleaned in the dishwasher, but I'm a little disappointed that it happened so quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Cazonette

customer_reviews.title: INSIDE SCRATCHES SO EASILY
customer_reviews.text: I received these as a house warming gift and was thrilled. Its been a couple years and Im tired of finding new scratches on the bottom of the inside of everything. I wash these by hand and use plastic utensils, but nothing is gentle enough. And the Handles get extremely hot very quickly. Sadly after less than 2yrs I am throwing them away since I cant find anything regarding a warranty. Pretty but not practical
customer_reviews.author: Jandiz E.

customer_reviews.title: Out of box damage
customer_reviews.text: I can’t review durability yet because I’ve only had them for a few days. I like the set however, 3 of the pans had damage out of the box. One had a big gouge in it but the color was over the gouge so it clearly was done in production. One has some chipping on the edge and the sheet pan has a dent in it. It’s not worth the aggravation of packing in all back in the box to return the set so I’ll just keep it, for what I paid I’ll be happy if I get a year out of them I suppose.
customer_reviews.author: Christy Gouvin

customer_reviews.title: Very durable yet not too heavy and easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Omg!!! I love this set!! I love the handles on the lids! The pots are not real heavy so easy to hold with one hand while emptying. The color is perfect and they are so easy to clean because nothing sticks to them
customer_reviews.author: Brock Leno

customer_reviews.title: True Color
customer_reviews.text: Love the color! So far have used them and no problems!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Set is small! Color fades fast.
customer_reviews.text: The set is basically very small in size. All pans are about 1/2 the size I thought them to be according to my old pans. Also, it is not dishwasher safe as the red outer side of the pan faded after 2 dish washings in the dish washer. Not impressed. Look for a better set.
customer_reviews.author: June Akam

customer_reviews.title: Would buy more if I could use more
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my son. I had bought myself a set a good while back and liked them so well I bought him a set . He likes them also. And they met girlfriend approval .
customer_reviews.author: John doe

customer_reviews.title: Peeling
customer_reviews.text: The orange coating started coming off the first time I used it. Expected better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Shae

customer_reviews.title: Marine blue is NOT blue.
customer_reviews.text: I am sure these pots and pans are well made and perfect in every way, except for the color. I haven't opened the box, but "Marine Blue" is not the pretty blue in the picture that I ordered from...it is a teal color - on the box. I would have gone with the other blue, but in that picture it looked so bright, almost electric blue. This is a Christmas gift and maybe they won't care, but I would not want this color for myself. I wasn't sure I could get them exchanged in time for Christmas, so we will see if they want to exchange them AFTER Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Kay A.

customer_reviews.title: Quality A-plus
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy with my new pots and pans long over due . I love Rachel Ray and my pretty pt n pan set ty
customer_reviews.author: Kate Storer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing as always with RR products!...
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in perfect condition! The cobalt blue color is absolutely stunning! The blue in the picture is exact! Once you get them the gradient coloring is very noticeable and adds a certain touch of glamour. These are non stick and perform very well and clean up was a breeze. I’ve had Rachael Ray cookware sets before in red and they lasted me about 6 years and even they are still in good condition! Quality cookware, incredible value, worth the investment if you are looking for a cookware set!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Thorne

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing quality 👎
customer_reviews.text: I was really disappointed with the quality of this cookware. Extremely light weight thin pots. Takes a very long time to heat up. I found it so strange that it takes so long for a pot of water to boil. I am so dissapointed, I expected so much more from the Rachel Ray brand. I own other cookware and utensils from this brand and love the quality, That is why I had to have these pots. This set of pots is not a keeper, provides unreliable results.
customer_reviews.author: LilRascal82

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd set I've gotten. Both damaged. The first had a bent pot. Now a bent lid. I don't want to return the entire set over 1 item so I'm stuck with it. Again. Never ordering Rachel Ray again.
customer_reviews.author: Kat Clark

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Buy!!
customer_reviews.text: This was absolutely the most disappointing purchase I could make. If I could give it negative 5 stars I would. This cookware has not held up at all. It is discolored and chips very easily. I cannot believe that Rachael Ray puts her name on this product .
customer_reviews.author: Christen Barnhart

customer_reviews.title: Bright color!
customer_reviews.text: Love how fun and bright the colors are! Super easy to clean, and loving the nonstick! Perfect for your money. Adds a nice of color to my kitchen!
customer_reviews.author: KellziRive

customer_reviews.title: going on 1 year now and I still love it. I handwash them so maybe that's why ...
customer_reviews.text: update: going on 1 year now and I still love it. I handwash them so maybe that's why they are lasting well this long but the colors are still vibrant.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: teflon coating came off in 1st year
customer_reviews.text: pans didn't hold up very well. Great at first, but pan started flaking material off.
customer_reviews.author: Padmo

customer_reviews.title: Super quality set
customer_reviews.text: I love green. This is the ONLY set of green pots and pans I could locate, anywhere. Super quality, nice set and I'm loving it.
customer_reviews.author: Jolene Clark

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: It came with rubber spatulas that were kind of off green color didn't really match the set but I do love my pots and pans ♡
customer_reviews.author: Chantelle Harkcom

customer_reviews.title: I am not disappointed at all.
customer_reviews.text: I love love love these pots for several reasons. First, easy clean up inside and outside. Secondly, food just slides out of it. Thirdly, I have tendonitis in my elbow and they are not heavy. Lastly, I just think that blue is gorgeous. I only use them for simple cooking such as spaghetti, sauces, beans cooking vegetables, eggs, sauteing. etc. I do not fry in these at all. I have other pots for that. I follow the care instructions to a tee and I am totally impressed for what I use them for.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Walker

customer_reviews.title: Nonstick surface peels within a month
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had these for less than a month and the non stick surface is starting to come off- I’ve been careful and haven’t used any utensils or cleaning items that would scratch them, haven’t put them through the dishwasher etc but still I already see peeling of the nonstick on two of the pans. For the money paid, this is uncool.
customer_reviews.author: Laurynne M. Paladino

customer_reviews.title: Excellent purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Bright & vibrant color! Incredible nonstick coating and durable! Extremely pleased with my purchase ☺
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Clark

customer_reviews.title: Great set
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my wife who always wanted a set of RR's. She loves these so much she now wants to add more of Rachael Rays stuff. For the price,these are great and I recommend them. Note: I only use them on electric stop top and oven. Can't tell u about gas stove.
customer_reviews.author: jef

customer_reviews.title: I've used them and I like them. Be warned that these are not an ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for the lady friend to fill out her previous set, some of which had begun to degrade after five years. I've used them and I like them. Be warned that these are not an exact color match with the older sets. Close but no cigar. But if you're more concerned with cooking qualities than having an H&G-worthy designer kitchen, as you should be, a good product at a good price.
customer_reviews.author: M Wolfe

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant and beautiful color
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a set and absolutely love them! Nothing so far has stuck to these pans. Amazing and easy clean up after using. I loved them so much that I purchased a set for my daughter. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: I was a little bit skeptical.
customer_reviews.text: We have a glass stove top I was a little worried there would be issues but nothing yet. My partner purchased these and at first I thought they were going to be cheap but they turned out to be amazing, they're relatively cheap and make cooking a blast! When they say "non stick" they mean it, take care to not ever leave non stick pans soaking or put them in the dishwasher and these will last, we haven't had a single issue yet.
customer_reviews.author: Mat and Rick

customer_reviews.title: This product will last forever
customer_reviews.text: I love this cookware, easy to clean beautiful bright color goes well with any color kitchen
customer_reviews.author: Julie White

customer_reviews.title: These are awesome!!!
customer_reviews.text: I got these pans two weeks ago and I am thrilled with the quality and design. They are pretty, functional and easy to clean. I love that the two pots are deeper than most some you can stir without spilling over. And I bought these from amazon warehouse so they were a great deal.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Lowery

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what i ordered
customer_reviews.text: There great easy to clean nothing sticks to the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremydswanson

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful color
customer_reviews.text: Gift for my mother in law and she is happy with them. The set just adds a little something extra but just as described. Very happy
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, high quality pots and pans.
customer_reviews.text: I love this pot and pan set. I love the color and they are a high quality set!
customer_reviews.author: Angela Farish

customer_reviews.title: Perfect !
customer_reviews.text: Got these on a deal and my favorite pans thus far
customer_reviews.author: Anachristina

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I've had these less than a week and already the orange enamel on the bottoms of the pots is scuffing off. I feel I've been very careful with them and can't believe the wear they are showing already. We have a gas stove...perhaps these would be a better fit for people with glass top stoves.
customer_reviews.author: Partyof5

customer_reviews.title: Great Cookware!
customer_reviews.text: I love rachel ray's cookware. I used this cookware as soon as it arrived. Nothing stuck to the pots and that made the clean up very easy. Everything wiped right out. There is also even heating which is very important to me when cooking steak or chicken dishes. I just love it and I would definitely buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Smoothe13

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!  The coating wears off after a couple of uses.
customer_reviews.text: I'm so disappointed in this purchase! The set is beautiful and matches the colors in my kitchen perfectly- I even bought some other matching Rachael Ray items- however the coating started to chip off after only using this for 2 months and now it's too late to return them. Don't waste your money! If it was possible to give zero stars I would!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Cooper

customer_reviews.title: I AM OBSESSED
customer_reviews.text: Everything you read about this cookware is true. It is really non-stick, cleans easy and is very durable. You must remember though to read the instructions! This cookware cannot be used on high heat or it will warp. The directions do tell you this, so pay attention.
customer_reviews.author: jack1124

customer_reviews.title: Love Love Love glasstop stove
customer_reviews.text: A bit expensive but I love these pans. I can use them on my glass top stove
customer_reviews.author: Pam Ohio

customer_reviews.title: the pots are not as good as I had hoped for from this brand
customer_reviews.text: The fry pans are exactly as I expected, the pots are not as good as I had hoped for from this brand. The fry pans are fairly thick (close to restraint quality) and appear to be slightly thicker on the bottom. The pot are thinner then expected ans are just a stamped pot similar in quality to an inexpensive T-Fal or Circulon the supermarket.
customer_reviews.author: UTAH7.62x39

customer_reviews.title: You're paying for the name, not quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought these bc I thought they were cute and I hoped that they'd be good quality coming from Rachel Ray. While cooking the non-stick layer started to scratch and peel within a couple weeks. I could've gotten the same quality for half the price at Walmart
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Awesome buy
customer_reviews.text: So happy I purchased this set for my mother for christmas. Sturdy pieces. Super easy to clean. Bright and fun.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Few months in—great product!
customer_reviews.text: My sister purchased these and recommended them. I used to have calphalon stainless steel collection and they were awful to clean. I’ve had these for a few months now—love them and super easy to clean!!!
customer_reviews.author: MBR

customer_reviews.title: 2.5 stars.....not great quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: We had this set for apx 1 year before the non-stick coating started to peel off. Also, for some reason, I have a hard time cleaning any stains that get on the bottom and sides of the pans.......it just stains permanently. I wasn't impressed with the quality for the price we paid. We have switched to T-Fal brand of cookware.....and they are wonderful....100% better, and it cost us 50% + less than our Rachel Ray set.
customer_reviews.author: JTJessee

customer_reviews.title: NICE ITEM
customer_reviews.text: HAD FOR OVER A YEAR AND STILL AWESOME, GREAT COLOR
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: pots and pans
customer_reviews.text: Best investment I've made. They are easy to clean. Cooking is enjoyable when you have pots and pans that don't stick and food slides right off. Price was not bad at all especially for a set.
customer_reviews.author: Lorena M.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Theses Pots and pans are amazing and I’m so glad I got them.
customer_reviews.author: Ladams

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and easy to clean!
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite pots and pans I have ever owned. When it says non-stick, it really means non-stick! I never have any trouble getting these clean after cooking. They are so low maintenance and look good too! I have gotten many compliments on them. They are very high quality!
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Rusted and busted. Multiple pots lining came off. Lasted about 8 months. Won't use this brand again
customer_reviews.author: Belle

customer_reviews.title: Amazing but...
customer_reviews.text: I love these pots and pans! They cook evenly, I love the silicone handles, and they're so easy to clean. My only criticism is that I wish the screws for the handles were sealed a little better or something. Those are a little hard to clean and they're real food catchers.
customer_reviews.author: caillie meils

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful color. Very non stick
customer_reviews.text: Very solid and I love the lids. The color is beautiful. Very non-stick. I don 't need butter or spray at all. These are heavy but not too heavy. No flimsy feeling but don't feel too heavy like iron which of course they aren't. So far after a few months of use and washing, still look like new. I have ordered a second set.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: It's hard to find blue kitchen ware, so it was a steal when it was on sale. Arrived earlier than expected, took only two days when to arrive when it was 5-8 business day shipping. Pretty color and matches our blue theme on our kitchen. Used one pan to make eggs and it works great, with our electric glass top. Hopefully, it will last long and the non stick will stay non stick.
customer_reviews.author: SSCONNER

customer_reviews.title: Best cookware ever
customer_reviews.text: The best cookware I ever had. Good variety of pans and pots. Good enough for all my cooking needs.
customer_reviews.author: CY

customer_reviews.title: Pretty nice pans
customer_reviews.text: Easy to clean, non stick, always use butter to coat the pan no oils, used a plastic spatula and seems like it still scratched, thats why a 3 star rating
customer_reviews.author: Vic

customer_reviews.text: The pans look amazing, function very well, dropped the big pot and it bent, no crack and still usable though.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel S.

customer_reviews.title: Durability?
customer_reviews.text: Purchased thru Amazon, December have used just a few times and noticed the small chip in the small fry pan, very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Jim Landwehr

customer_reviews.title: Cheap quality
customer_reviews.text: Took a week and a half to receive them when I chose 2 day shipping then unpacked them and the lids are bent.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Hubbard

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Pots
customer_reviews.text: Those whole pot set is fabulous...I love it and the gray color is very nice. I ordered another set for a family member.
customer_reviews.author: Rena F Brown

customer_reviews.title: Bad merchandising, low quality product
customer_reviews.text: Arrived damaged. non stick coat so flimsy that it's was already peeling before it got to my place. good looking set, very bad quality.
customer_reviews.author: SONNY S BLEICHER

customer_reviews.title: love the color
customer_reviews.text: my last set lasted 2 years which is longer then most
customer_reviews.author: robert bray

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT waste your money
customer_reviews.text: My pots and pans have never been in the dishwasher, nor has anything 'burned' in them. Yet the outside was dull very quickly and now the paint is coming off and the interior is flaking off. Cannot use them like that because I am sure that is NOT safe. Do NOT buy these - you will be sorry.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Perkins

customer_reviews.title: Yes to it all!
customer_reviews.text: Love my cookware!!! Easy to clean from hot to cold dishes these are everything!!!
customer_reviews.author: Savage

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Always wanted these and finally got them and they are perfect. Stylish and function as described. Must be careful with utensils tho scrapping the coating off the bottom
customer_reviews.author: Evangeline  Darling

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a Christmas gift and i absolutely love them. I haven't used every pan yet but the ones i’ve used cook evenly and food does not stick. Also, they wash very easily. I would definitely recommend this set and would buy it again!
customer_reviews.author: BECKY LAMONT

customer_reviews.title: Surprise, not.
customer_reviews.text: Fine enough for price, but arrived with contents depicted clearly on package and label even though I had asked for the option of hiding the box pics... thus ruining my son's christmas present surprise.
customer_reviews.author: Audrey Esposito

customer_reviews.title: Nice set for a starter guy/gal apt situation
customer_reviews.text: Very nice set. I've been using them for quite a while and all of them are still going strong. They are very well constructed and the materials are good. The colors are good and I don't see any peeling or anything like that. The teflon is also pretty good non stick
customer_reviews.author: vj55

customer_reviews.title: love these pots & pans
customer_reviews.text: The only complaint I have, is that when I stored one of the pots within another pot, some of the non-stick material was scratched (but not enough to flake off or return). This happened almost immediately. Overall, they're great pots. As seen in the other reviews, definitely take care of them and cook properly with them. Do not blast the heat on the enamel, slowly heat up the cookware. The color helps brighten up the kitchen, I'd recommend this set.
customer_reviews.author: D. Marie

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Great set upon arrival, I use them almost everyday but the green porcelain is already coming off... Not worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: keri forster

customer_reviews.title: Not as durable as expected
customer_reviews.text: The pots and pans are good but the spatula melted while making pancakes and a tiny section of the non stick coating already chipped off of the saute pan. I have had them only 2 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Psssh

customer_reviews.title: Love Rachel ray products
customer_reviews.text: Just received my pAn set, and first time that I used pan a small burn mark lol the bottom of pan, why was cooking on below medium heat...
customer_reviews.author: Lynne Chapman

customer_reviews.title: Sent it back
customer_reviews.text: We returned this cookware. They included a warning with the cookware about using it on a glass cooktop, but the warning is not on the Amazon product page.
customer_reviews.author: Wallace King

customer_reviews.title: blue pots n pans
customer_reviews.text: i rate this 5 star all the way these pans are PERFECT i also have an orange set, there fun and no so cheap for the cheap price you pay opposed to the waste of money you would spend upgrading every year on cheaper ones. mine have lasted me 2 years with everyday cooking and are still in perfect shape and condition! :) i would most deff. recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Eschmann

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Biught for my son as a gift and he loves it. I would buy more even for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: I love this set
customer_reviews.text: I love this set. They are more green than pictured but are a breeze to cook with. They can not go in the oven, but clean up is very quick.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Best pans ever
customer_reviews.text: Love love love these pans. I have had them for a few months now and they are amazing So easy to clean too!
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Fraser

customer_reviews.title: Paid for the brand!
customer_reviews.text: The quality seems comparable with middle of the line products that you can buy at Walmart. I personally feel that I paid for the brand more than the product itself. The pans are smaller than my previous set. They do cook evenly, which is the most important aspect. I was also expecting a solid orange and received a two-tone. Overall, they server their purpose!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Beach

customer_reviews.title: Met expectations
customer_reviews.text: Just great! I expected nothing less. Wish the color was a little lighter though.
customer_reviews.author: Consumer340

product_meta.title: Rachael Ray Brights Nonstick Cookware Pots and Pans Set, 10 Piece, Marine Blue
product_meta.description: Size:10 Piece| Color:Marine BlueJumpstart your home cooking in style with the Rachael Ray(r) Classic Brights Hard Enamel Nonstick Cookware 10-Piece Set that adds cookware performance and flair to the kitchen. From saucepans and skillets to a large stockpot for one of Rachael Ray’s delish stoups, this versatile nonstick cookware set makes it easy to whip up your favorite dishes. The pots and pans feature the quality design and construction expected from Rachael Ray(r) for fast, efficient cooking when you want and need it most. Long-lasting nonstick on the cooking set makes food release and cleaning up easy. Rachael Ray knows how to make cooking fun, easy and colorful, for great food and good times. The colorful cookware exteriors provide a pop of kitchen personality, and match the grippy silicone handles on these pots and pans. The pots and saute pan in her cookware set feature shatter-resistant glass lids to keep the heat and moisture inside. The cookware is oven safe to 350°F, and goes great with many other items from the full Rachael Ray collection. The Rachael Ray Classic Brights 10-Piece Hard Enamel Nonstick Cookware Set includes the right kitchenware ingredients to help make your cooking and Rach’s recipes even more delish.
feature_bullets: FAST HEATING POTS AND PANS SET: Rachael Ray cookware set features sturdy aluminum construction for fast, efficient heating with reduced hot spots
COOKWARE SET SET INCLUDES: 1-Quart Saucepan with Lid, 2-Quart Saucepan with Lid, 3-Quart Sauté Pan with Lid, 6-Quart Stockpot with Lid, 8.5-Inch Frying Pan, 10-Inch Frying Pan
COLORFUL AND EASY TO CLEAN COOKWARE: Durable, easy-cleaning porcelain enamel pots and pans add bold color to the kitchen
HIGH-QUALITY NONSTICK PERFORMANCE: Long-lasting nonstick releases food quickly and cleans easily; shatter-resistant glass lids seal in heat and moisture while cooking remains visible
EASY HANDLING POTS AND PANS: Comfortable coordinating grippy cooking set handles are double-riveted for extra strength
STOVE TO OVEN EASY: Pots and pans are oven safe to 35 degrees F
